time-lived.text.try-again: You lived for %s day(s). How about we try that again, shall we?
time-lived.text.try-harder: You lived for %s day(s). Let's see if we can last a bit longer next time.
time-lived.text.maybe-next-time: You lived for %s day(s). Uh... maybe next time will be better.
time-lived.text.time-travel: Wait... did you travel back in time?
time-lived.text.new-record: All right! New record! You surpassed your previous record of %s day(s)!
